simplifyAtleastClauseByBinaryClauses(Clause) - Method in class Solvers.Resolution.Resolution

simplifyLongerClausesByBinaryClause(Clause) - Method in class Solvers.Resolution.Resolution

simplifyLongerDisjunctionByLongerClauses(Clause) - Method in class Solvers.Resolution.Resolution
